## **Chart 3**

data \<- starwars %\>%

select (name, gender, mass, height, species) %\>%

filter (species == "Human" \| species == "Droid") %\>%

na.omit()

ggplot(data, aes(x=name, y=height, fill = name)) +

geom_bar(stat = "identity") +

labs(title = "Height of Star Wars Characters")+

theme(legend.position="none")+

coord_flip()

![](Rplot02.png)

## **Chart 5**

library(ggplot2)

library(tidyverse)

data \<- data.frame(

id=seq(1,100),

individual=paste( "Mister", seq(1,100), sep=""),

value=sample( seq(10,100), 100, replace=T)

)

ggplot(data, aes(x=as.factor(id), y=value)) +

geom_bar(stat="identity", fill=alpha("red", 0.3)) +

ylim(-100,120) +

theme_minimal() +

theme(

axis.text = element_blank(),

axis.title = element_blank(),

panel.grid = element_blank(),

plot.margin = unit(rep(-2,4), "cm")

) +

coord_polar(start = 0)

![](Rplot03.png)
